tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE indie_game_settings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(255),
    developer_name VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    setting1 VARCHAR(255),
    setting2 VARCHAR(255),
    setting3 VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE GameSettings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(255),
    developer VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    settings JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE GameConfigurations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    configuration_name VARCHAR(255),
    configuration_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES GameSettings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_configs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  game_id INT NOT NULL,
  config_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  config_value TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Characters (
    char_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    char_name VARCHAR(255),
    char_class VARCHAR(50),
    health_points INT,
    attack_damage INT
);
